price: Dia (Musa) menjawab, "Tuhan kami ialah (Tuhan) yang telah memberikan bentuk kejadian kepada segala sesuatu, kemudian memberinya petunjuk."516)
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
footnotes: *516) Memberikan akal, insting (naluri) dan kodrat alamiah untuk kelanjutan hidupnya masing-masing.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbunā alladhī aʿṭā kulla shayin khalqahu thumma hadā
